dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1961
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Citing recent violence against missionaries, she wonders if they are being prepared to face death. Ponders the meaning of self-defense and the need to combat fear. Keywords: non-violence, prison, jail
